strings.Value: "Seems that today Pharasma was hoping I'd drop by for a cup of tea… I do so hate to disappoint women."
"I remember one other time I barely escaped death. It happened somewhere in Varisia, as I recall. Seems destiny is out of new tricks, so she starts repeating her old favorites."
"Hahaha! That's the right way to talk about death — jokes and scoffs!"
"I bet Jubilost has been racking his brains for three nights straight, trying to come up with that joke... And spent the next three waiting for an opportunity to tell it."
"Today your witty lines encourage rather than hurt people's feelings. We could use more of that!"
"Putting on a brave face? Well, the same fate awaits both the cowardly and the fearless... Although some meet their ends sooner than others."
